text.headline: Star Wars: Episode I – The Phantom Menace
text.text:
Release Date: 1999-05-19
Type: Movie

The Jedi Knights discover Anakin Skywalker, a young boy strong with the Force, and encounter the Sith for the first time in a thousand years.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode II – Attack of the Clones
text.text:
Release Date: 2002-05-16
Type: Movie

Ten years after The Phantom Menace, the galaxy is on the brink of civil war as Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker face new threats.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode III – Revenge of the Sith
text.text:
Release Date: 2005-05-19
Type: Movie

Anakin Skywalker succumbs to the dark side, becoming Darth Vader, as the Jedi face extinction and the Republic transforms into the Empire.

text.headline: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (Movie)
text.text:
Release Date: 2008-08-15
Type: Movie

The Republic fights against the Separatists, with Anakin Skywalker and his apprentice Ahsoka Tano playing key roles.

text.headline: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2008-2014, 2020
Type: Series

An animated series depicting the events of the Clone Wars between Episodes II and III, focusing on Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Ahsoka Tano.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope
text.text:
Release Date: 1977-05-25
Type: Movie

The Rebel Alliance strikes a decisive blow against the Empire as Luke Skywalker begins his journey to become a Jedi Knight.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back
text.text:
Release Date: 1980-05-21
Type: Movie

The Empire hunts the Rebels as Luke Skywalker seeks guidance from Jedi Master Yoda while facing Darth Vader.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode VI – Return of the Jedi
text.text:
Release Date: 1983-05-25
Type: Movie

Luke Skywalker confronts Darth Vader and Emperor Palpatine, while the Rebel Alliance launches a final attack against the Empire.

text.headline: Star Wars Rebels (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2014-2018
Type: Series

An animated series set between Episodes III and IV, following a group of rebels fighting against the Empire.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode VII – The Force Awakens
text.text:
Release Date: 2015-12-18
Type: Movie

Thirty years after the Empire's defeat, the First Order rises, and Rey, a scavenger, discovers her connection to the Force.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode VIII – The Last Jedi
text.text:
Release Date: 2017-12-15
Type: Movie

The Resistance fights for survival against the First Order, while Rey seeks to learn the ways of the Force from Luke Skywalker.

text.headline: Star Wars: Episode IX – The Rise of Skywalker
text.text:
Release Date: 2019-12-20
Type: Movie

The Resistance faces the resurrected Emperor Palpatine as Rey discovers her true heritage.

text.headline: The Mandalorian (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2019-present
Type: Series

A lone bounty hunter navigates the galaxy after the fall of the Empire, protecting a mysterious child with Force abilities.

text.headline: Star Wars: The Bad Batch (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2021-present
Type: Series

A group of elite clone troopers navigate the aftermath of the Clone Wars as the Empire rises to power.

text.headline: Star Wars: Visions (Anthology)
text.text:
Release Date: 2021-09-22
Type: Series

An anthology series featuring different stories inspired by the Star Wars universe, created by various anime studios.

text.headline: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2022-05-27
Type: Series

A limited series following Obi-Wan Kenobi's life in exile, set between Episodes III and IV.

text.headline: Andor (Series)
text.text:
Release Date: 2022-09-21
Type: Series

A series focused on Cassian Andor's journey in the early days of the Rebellion, before the events of Rogue One.

text.headline: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
text.text:
Release Date: 2003-07-16
Type: Game

An RPG set 4,000 years before the rise of the Galactic Empire, following a customizable protagonist in a battle against the Sith.

text.headline: Star Wars Battlefront (2015)
text.text:
Release Date: 2015-11-17
Type: Game

A multiplayer shooter set across various iconic Star Wars locations, allowing players to fight as Rebels or Imperials.

text.headline: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
text.text:
Release Date: 2019-11-15
Type: Game

An action-adventure game following Cal Kestis, a young Jedi Padawan, as he evades the Empire's Inquisitors after the fall of the Jedi Order.

text.headline: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga
text.text:
Release Date: 2022-04-05
Type: Game

An action-adventure game that covers all nine mainline Star Wars films, featuring LEGO-style humor and gameplay.

text.headline: Star Wars: Heir to the Empire
text.text:
Release Date: 1991-05-01
Type: Book

The first book in Timothy Zahn's Thrawn Trilogy, which introduces Grand Admiral Thrawn and continues the story after Episode VI.

text.headline: Star Wars: Dark Force Rising
text.text:
Release Date: 1992-06-01
Type: Book

The second installment of the Thrawn Trilogy, where Grand Admiral Thrawn continues his campaign against the New Republic.

text.headline: Star Wars: The Last Command
text.text:
Release Date: 1993-04-01
Type: Book

The conclusion of the Thrawn Trilogy, where Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia confront Thrawn's forces.

text.headline: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire
text.text:
Release Date: 1996-05-01
Type: Book

A multimedia project set between Episodes V and VI, featuring a novel, comic, and video game. The book follows the heroes' mission to rescue Han Solo.

text.headline: Star Wars: Bloodline
text.text:
Release Date: 2016-05-03
Type: Book

A novel by Claudia Gray set six years before Episode VII, focusing on Princess Leia's journey and the rise of the First Order.

text.headline: Star Wars: Thrawn
text.text:
Release Date: 2017-04-11
Type: Book

A novel by Timothy Zahn that explores the origins of Grand Admiral Thrawn and his rise through the ranks of the Empire.

text.headline: Star Wars: Master & Apprentice
text.text:
Release Date: 2019-04-16
Type: Book

A novel by Claudia Gray set before Episode I, following the adventures of Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
